author: jmason
msg: probs db is now obsolete; please rerun the Bayes learners (again ;).   Learner now allows learning from a subset of mails, using --learnprob switch. Subset can be controlled using --randseed arg.  Bayes 10pcv driver now keeps more logs, allows --learnprob args to be passed, uses the same randseed for all runs, runs timing too, keeps copy of entire bayes db dir.   IP_ADDRESS regexp now a qr//.
